ing: 1 banana, cut into pieces and frozen
des: "A delicious (though a bit odd looking) smoothie that is dairy free and fills that chocolate-mint craving!"
ins: Blend coconut milk, spinach, mint leaves, cacao seeds, peppermint extract, and stevia powder in a blender. While blender is running, drop in banana chunks, one by one. Add ice cubes until smoothie has desired thickness, and water if smoothie is too thick.
